Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: OpenCms has an inline editor that allows you to edit content inline - without opening the form-based content editor. The inline editor has to be configured in a content's formatter to make parts of the content inline editable. We summarize how to add inline editing facilities to your formatter.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Learn how to configure inline editing in a formatter.

Link.LinkText: See how to edit content inline.
